section.title: 创建表空间
section.screen: create tablespace test datafile '/opt/app/oracle/oradata/test.dbf' size 8M autoextend on next 5M maxsize 10M;
section.para: maxsize unlimited 是大小不受限制
section.screen: create tablespace test datafile '/opt/app/oracle/oradata/test.dbf' size 800M autoextend on next 50M maxsize unlimited
section.para: unform表示区的大小相同，默认为1M
section.screen: create tablespace test datafile '/opt/app/oracle/oradata/test.dbf' size 800M autoextend on next 50M maxsize 1000M extent management local uniform;
section.para: unform size 500K表示区的大小相同，为500K
section.screen: create tablespace test datafile '/opt/app/oracle/oradata/test.dbf' size 800M autoextend on next 50M maxsize 1000M extent management local uniform size 500K;
section.para: autoallocate 表示区的大小由随表的大小自动动态改变
section.screen: create tablespace test datafile '/opt/app/oracle/oradata/test.dbf' size 800M autoextend on next 50M maxsize 1000M extent management local autoallocate;
section.para: temporary 创建字典管理临时表空间
section.screen: create tablespace test datafile '/opt/app/oracle/oradata/test.dbf' size 800M autoextend on next 50M maxsize 1000M temporary;

section.title: 临时表空间
section.para: 创建临时表空间，语句中的datafile都换为tempfile
section.screen: create temporary tablespace test tempfile '/opt/app/oracle/oradata/test.dbf' size 800M autoextend on next 50M maxsize 1000M
